newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada's Prairies to see sunny, warming weather.
newsitem.headline: Canada's Prairies to see sunny, warming weather.

text.p: Canada's Prairies on Thursday were forecast to see sunny skies and warming weather with some scattered showers, Environment Canada said.
Alberta should see highs of +9 to +19 Celsius and sun.
Saskatchewan should see highs of +8 to +18 Celsius with showers in the north.
Manitoba should see highs of 0 to +10 Celsius with a 30 percent chance of showers.
The normal high at this time of year is +10 Celsius.
